mapper.update: update permission p join `user` u on p.user_id = u.id set p.is_agree_location = #{map.is_agree_location}, u.lat = #{map.lat}, u.lng = #{map.lng}, u.regions = #{map.regions} where u.id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select is_agree_home, is_agree_info, is_agree_dynamic, is_agree_location from permission where user_id = #{userId}
